protein.specific_function: Guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF), which can activate some, but not all, G-alpha proteins by exchanging bound GDP for free GTP. Able to potentiate G(olf)-alpha- dependent cAMP accumulation suggesting that it may be an important component for odorant signal transduction
